author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-5449: 10.8 client with 10.5 server gives ClassCastException
Convert BOOLEAN parameter values to SMALLINT (and not only the parameter
meta-data) when talking to old servers that don't understand BOOLEAN.

author: felixk
msg: - Use inheritance for distributionManagement.site.url doesn't works, because the artifactId will be added to the url when inherited (see http://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-site-plugin/usage.html). So each module has to define it itself.
- pmd-plugin doesn't takes configuration from pluginManagement section when creating reports.
